title: Miloš Ubović
text:
Miloš Ubović (; born 25 September 1998) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er, playing for <a href="FK%20Cement%20Beo%C4%8Din">Cement Beočin</a>.
Club career.
Ubović came through the <a href="FK%20Indeks%20Novi%20Sad">Indeks Novi Sad</a> youth academy, being a member of the club until summer 2016. He also played in the last fixture of the 2015–16 season, joining the game as a substitute against <a href="FK%20Vinogradar%20Ledinci">Vinogradar</a>. Shortly after he signed with <a href="FK%20Proleter%20Novi%20Sad">Proleter Novi Sad</a>, Ubović was loaned on a one-year dual registration to <a href="FK%20Srbobran">FK Srbobran</a>, also playing with Proleter's youth team. Ubović made his senior debut for Proleter Novi Sad in the last away fixture of the <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Serbian%20First%20League">2016–17 Serbian First League</a> season, played on 27 May 2017 against <a href="FK%20Jagodina">Jagodina</a>.
